downloadTitle: Supply Chain System sample diagram for Visio 2010
downloadDescription: Get a visual overview of your manufacturing supply chain with this Visio 2010 sample diagram.
detailsSection: Use this Microsoft Visio 2010 sample diagram to see how Visio can be used to manage a manufacturing supply chain. This sample shows a high-level visual overview of the supply chain for a motorcycle manufacturer, including specific resource information from separate locations. The diagram covers assembly time and transportation time, mode, origin, and destination for individual components through to final overall assembly. This sample could also be applied to other processes with a series of dependencies, such as construction or an office move.
installInstructionSection: Click Download to save the sample diagram to your computer.
